description:
Update - 890 Students in the first 48 hours! Discover how you can build a great email campaign, too!

This is a step-by-step, day-by-day, 21-day blueprint on how to build an effective email campaign. This campaign will work for email marketers in any niche and at any level of experience - I'll take you by the hand to build your first campaign, or give you proven strategies to build upon your current success.

This sequence has been perfected across a decade of marketing online, and it's geared towards making maximum sales - without burning out your list.

You'll discover how valuable repeat customers are, and exactly how to nurture subscribers into raving fans who are ready to buy your next product, training, or coaching program.

I'll also show you how to write emails that build a strong relationship with your prospect - emails that make them think, that change their lives, and that they want to forward on to friends or colleagues.

You can drop this 21-day sequence into your autoresponder after you customize it for your business and see results within days.

The next few days will go by no matter what - use them to build an email campaign that will change your business... and your customer's lives... forever.
title: Email Psychology: How to Write an Effective Email Campaign
